about_the_game:
Wassie Tale

Wassie Tale follows the journey of one of the bravest Wassies in all of Wassie history. In a heroic attempt to extend their lifespan beyond 14 days, Wassie #3320 must hop, fly, glide, swim & slam their way across a variety of unique landscapes. Experience the world from a Wassies point of view in this 2D, collectible rich, lore filled Adventure!

Varied Environments

From steep volcanoes laden with lava, to dense jungles enveloped in vines, Wassie Tale features a diverse set of levels that will challenge Wassie #3320 like never before.

Collectibles

Along their journey, Wassie #3320 will have the opportunity to collect a wide range of trinkets and knick-knacks. Playing Cards, fine works of Art & long forgotten knowledge await those brave enough to gather them.

short_description: Wassie Tale tells the story of one courageous Wassie & their treacherous journey. Hop, fly, swim & slam your way across diverse levels in this lore-rich, challenging 2D Side Scroller. Do you have what it takes to become the savior of all Wassie-kind?
